attributes.action: STOP THE BBC USING LICENSE PAYERS MONEY FOR PROGRAMMES LIKE ESCAPE TO THE COUNTRY
attributes.additional_details: Sick to death of seeing the BBC wasting license payers money to fund garbage programmes such as Escape to the Country, helping people to find homes when they can obviously afford to look for a new home on their own. Its wrong, and should not be happening. WHY should we be helping those people, when times are hard. The BBC could find better use for the money and deliver better programmes.

rejection.details: Government doesn't intervene with day-to-day running of BBC.
